Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket

Class AdrenalineClientSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.AdrenalineClient
      • it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.AdrenalineClientSocket
  • public class AdrenalineClientSocket
extends AdrenalineClient
    This class implements a Socket based connection with the server and is used only if the user chooses so. It implements through socket logic all the abstract methods in AdrenalineClient.

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AdrenalineClientSocket​(java.lang.String serverName, int serverPort, View view)
      Sets global parameters and signs up to bottleNeck event, which notifies when a disconnection occurs.

                              int serverPort,
                              View view)
        Sets global parameters and signs up to bottleNeck event, which notifies when a disconnection occurs.
        Parameters:
        serverName - hostname of the server
        serverPort - Port of the server this class communicates with
        view - Reference to the interface which communicates with the user

    • Method Detail

      • setupView

        protected void setupView()
        Signs up to name, color game length, map type and new command events. Once an event triggers, this class communicates user's choice to server. Also signs up to actionDone event.
        Overrides:
        setupView in class AdrenalineClient

      • startPing

        protected void startPing()
        Calls the method on the server that starts a thread dedicated to the periodical pinging of the client. Its role is to make sure that the connection between server and client is always functioning.
        Specified by:
        startPing in class AdrenalineClient
